# [Interview #691: Ancient 17th Shard Question and Answer, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=691#7)

#### Chaos

Is Edgli Endowment's real name?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO, however the flowers are related to Endowment somehow...
